trans-unit.source: The data to retrieve from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 要从提供者检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: 引用在从提供者检索行数据时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the connection or transformer must retrieve the row data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 当 Web 部件控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>接口，并可用作 Web 部件连接中，连接或转换器中的提供程序必须从提供程序检索的行数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate represents the method to call for retrieving the provider data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback>委托表示要调用来检索提供程序数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate parameter.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A>中使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>类和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>类检索转换的行数据。
